name: Mr. LightMan Will 2
description:
You have once conquered the first facility, but a bombardment destroyed the facility, so the makers made another facility. It's your job to get the 5, or 7 symbols.

Characters This roams around, and if you bump into it, it's game over.

The fun one, and likes to play tag, so be careful. Luckily, He's slow!

Still alive, and a little bit damaged, and is faster!Roams around slowly, like the Fun Terroristee!
Trys to find the symbol before you!
Roams around you, trying to surround you!
